<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->
	<footer class="footer" role="contentinfo">
		<div class="footer-btn-bar-container">

			</div>
		</div>

	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Food Assistance Directory</h1>
	<form action="../../patterns/04-pages-01-get-help-01-get-help-directory/04-pages-01-get-help-01-get-help-directory.html" method="post" class="inline-form find-help">           
	    <fieldset>
		    <legend>Find food near you</legend>
		    <label for="help-field" class="is-vishidden">Email address</label>
		    <div class="inline-container">
		   		<input type="newsletter" placeholder="Enter your neighborhood or zip code" id="help-field" class="help-field" />
		    	<button class="newsletter-submit">Search</button>
			</div>
	    </fieldset>
	</form>		</div>		<div class="main-body">
			<div class="directory-results">
				<ul class="directory-list">
					<li>
						<div class="vcard">
							<div class="adr">
								<div class="org fn">
									<h3 class="organization-name">Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h3>
								</div>
								<div class="street-address">1 North Linden Street</div>
								<span class="locality">Duquesne</span>, 
								<abbr title="Pennsylvania" class="region">PA</abbr>
								<span class="postal-code">15110</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<a href="#" class="text-btn">More info</a>
					</li>
				</ul>
			</div>
			<div class="directory-map-container">
				<iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d97183.46594409148!2d-79.98050050000002!3d40.43136844999993!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x8834f16f48068503%3A0x8df915a15aa21b34!2sPittsburgh%2C+PA!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sus!4v1404788856245" width="600" height="450" frameborder="0" style="border:0" id="directory-map"></iframe>
			</div>
		</div><!--end .main-body-->
	</div><!--End role=main-->
<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->

	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header pumpkins">
			<h1 class="page-title">Programs</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">Our programs help x people Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur</p>
		</div>		<div class="lc">
			<div class="g g-3up">
				<div class="gi">
					<div class="block block-thumb">
						<a href="#" class="b-inner">
							<div class="b-img">
			<img src="../../images/fpo_square.png" alt="Square Thumbnail" />							</div>
							<div class="b-text">
								<h2 class="b-title">Food Security Partnership</h2>
								<p class="b-excerpt">140 characer or less description of the program Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur</p>
							</div>
						</a>
					</div>				</div>
				<div class="gi">
					<div class="block block-thumb">
						<a href="#" class="b-inner">
							<div class="b-img">
			<img src="../../images/fpo_square.png" alt="Square Thumbnail" />							</div>
							<div class="b-text">
								<h2 class="b-title">Produce to People</h2>
								<p class="b-excerpt">140 characer or less description of the program Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur</p>
							</div>
						</a>
					</div>				</div>
				<div class="gi">
					<div class="block block-thumb">
						<a href="#" class="b-inner">
							<div class="b-img">
			<img src="../../images/fpo_square.png" alt="Square Thumbnail" />							</div>

								<p class="b-excerpt">140 characer or less description of the program Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur</p>
							</div>
						</a>
					</div>				</div>

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>

				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">

					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->

    Program Detail Page

    Produce to People provides lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer fringilla sem a urna porttitor fringilla. Nulla eget justo felis.

    Aliquam erat volutpat. Mauris vulputate scelerisque feugiat. Cras a erat a diam venenatis aliquam. Sed tempus, purus ac pretium varius.

    Heading Level 2

    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • An unordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is not important. Sometimes, an unordered list is a bulleted list. And this is a long list item in an unordered list that can wrap onto a new line.
    • Lists can be nested inside of each other
      • This is a nested list item
      • This is another nested list item in an unordered list
    • This is the last list item

    A block quotation (also known as a long quotation or extract) is a quotation in a written document, that is set off from the main text as a paragraph, or block of text, and typically distinguished visually using indentation and a different typeface or smaller size quotation.

    Heading Level 3

    Cras at fringilla ipsum. Donec nec libero eget est blandit dignissim a eu ante. Morbi augue nulla, luctus eu sagittis vel, malesuada ut felis.

    1. This is a list item in an ordered list
    2. An ordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is important. An ordered list does not necessarily contain sequence characters.
    3. Lists can be nested inside of each other
      1. This is a nested list item
      2. This is another nested list item in an ordered list
    4. This is the last list item

    Heading Level 4

    Donec posuere fringilla nunc, vitae venenatis diam scelerisque vel. Nullam vitae mauris magna. Mauris et diam quis justo volutpat tincidunt congue nec magna. Curabitur vitae orci elit.

    © 2014 All Rights Reserved. View our Privacy Policy

    This pattern contains: templates-program-detail

	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Program Detail Page</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">Produce to People provides lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing</p>
		</div>		<div class="main-body l">
			<div class="l-main">
				<div class="lc lc-single">
					<div class="text">
						<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer fringilla sem a urna porttitor fringilla. Nulla eget justo felis. </p>
						
						<p><a href="#">Aliquam erat volutpat.</a> Mauris vulputate scelerisque feugiat. Cras a erat a diam venenatis aliquam. Sed tempus, purus ac pretium varius.</p>
						<h2>Heading Level 2</h2>
	<ul>
		<li>This is a list item in an unordered list</li>
		<li>An unordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is not important. Sometimes, an unordered list is a bulleted list. And this is a long list item in an unordered list that can wrap onto a new line. </li>
		<li>
			Lists can be nested inside of each other
			<ul>
				<li>This is a nested list item</li>
				<li>This is another nested list item in an unordered list</li>
			</ul>
		</li>
		<li>This is the last list item</li>
	</ul>
						
	<blockquote>
		<p>A block quotation (also known as a long quotation or extract) is a quotation in a written document, that is set off from the main text as a paragraph, or block of text, and typically distinguished visually using indentation and a different typeface or smaller size quotation.</p>
	</blockquote>						<h3>Heading Level 3</h3>
						<p>Cras at fringilla ipsum. Donec nec libero eget est blandit dignissim a eu ante. Morbi augue nulla, luctus eu sagittis vel, malesuada ut felis.</p>
						
	<ol>
		<li>This is a list item in an ordered list</li>
		<li>An ordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is important. An ordered list does not necessarily contain sequence characters.</li>
		<li>
			Lists can be nested inside of each other
			<ol>
				<li>This is a nested list item</li>
				<li>This is another nested list item in an ordered list</li>
			</ol>
		</li>
		<li>This is the last list item</li>
	</ol>						<h4>Heading Level 4</h4>
						<p>Donec posuere fringilla nunc, vitae venenatis diam scelerisque vel. Nullam vitae mauris magna. Mauris et diam quis justo volutpat tincidunt congue nec magna. Curabitur vitae orci elit. </p>
					</div>				</div>

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>

						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->

										<div class="adr">
											<div class="org fn">
												<div class="organization-name">Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</div>
											</div>
											<div class="street-address">1 North Linden Street</div>
											<span class="locality">Duquesne</span>, 
											<abbr title="Pennsylvania" class="region">PA</abbr>
											<span class="postal-code">15110</span>
										</div>
									</div>
									<a href="../../patterns/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact.html"><span class="icon-location"></span>Get Directions</a>
								</div>
						</div><!--end .gi-->
						<div class="gi">
							<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle">If you need food</h3>
							<div class="acc-panel">
								<p>If you need food, please contact Hunger Services Network of the Urban League of Pittsburgh</p>
								<a href="tel:+14123250749"><span class="icon-phone"></span>412-325-0749</a>
								<a href="http://ulpgh.org/" rel="external"><span class="icon-link"></span>ulpgh.org</a>
							</div>
						</div><!--end .gi-->
					</div><!--end inner .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .gi-->
				<div class="gi">
					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle">Stay Up to Date</h3>
					<div class="acc-panel">
						<p>Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.</p>
					<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form newsletter-form">           
					    <fieldset>
						    <legend>Sign up for our newsletter</legend>
						    <label for="newsletter-field" class="is-vishidden">Email address</label>
						    <div class="inline-container">
						   		<input type="newsletter" placeholder="E-mail address" id="newsletter-field" class="newsletter-field" />
						    	<button class="newsletter-submit">Sign Up</button>
							</div>
					    </fieldset>
					</form>					<ul class="social-list">

					</ul>					</div>
				</div><!--end .gi-->
			</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			
			<div class="footer-meta">
			<a href="../../patterns/04-pages-00-home-00-homepage/04-pages-00-home-00-homepage.html" rel="home" class="logo-link" tabindex="1"><img src="../../images/logo.svg" class="logo" alt="Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank, a member of Feeding America" /></a>				<p class="copyright">&copy; 2014 All Rights Reserved. <a href="../../patterns/04-pages-10-other-02-privacy-policy/04-pages-10-other-02-privacy-policy.html">View our Privacy Policy</a></p>

	</footer>
	<!-- End Footer --></div>

    About the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Dedicated to eradicating hunger lorem ipsum dolor sit amet Lorem ipsum dolor

    Mission Statement

    Lorem ipsum door sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Odio, blanditiis, qui fugiat facere esse nam at eius aliquam veniam perferendis iste vel! Veritatis.

    Award-winning Operations

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->
	<footer class="footer" role="contentinfo">

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

    Jobs & Internships

    Join the fight at the GPCFB to eradicate hunger in the Pittsburgh area and beyond lorem ipsum.

    Available Jobs & Internships

    The following career opportunities are currently open at the Food Bank:

    • Feb 02, 2014

      Truck Driver

      Responsible for warehouse product care including receiving, storage, distribution, pickup and/or delivery.

    • Feb 02

      Grant Writer

      Prepare proposals for submission to potential funding sources to obtain funds for ongoing or special GPCFB projects.

    • Feb 02 2014

      Network Resource Specialist

      Provide support to facilitate Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank member network development and provide information, referrals, and food assistance to families within our eleven-county service area.

    Want to Apply?

    If you would like to apply for a position, you may email your cover letter and resume to careers@pittsburghfoodbank.org, fax to 412-460-0418

    Contact Human Resources

    • About the GPCFB

    • Contact Us

    • $500
    • $

										<div class="page" id="page">
	<!-- Begin .header -->
	<header class="header" role="banner">
		<div class="lc">
		<a href="../../patterns/04-pages-00-home-00-homepage/04-pages-00-home-00-homepage.html" rel="home" class="logo-link" tabindex="1"><img src="../../images/logo.svg" class="logo" alt="Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank, a member of Feeding America" /></a>			<a href="#search-form" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-search"><span class="icon-search"></span></a>
			<a href="#nav" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-menu"><span class="icon-menu2"></span><span class="nav-toggle-label">Menu</span></a>
			<div class="header-nav-container">
			<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form search-form">           
			    <fieldset>
				    <legend class="is-vishidden">Search</legend>
				    <label for="search-field" class="is-vishidden">Search</label>
				    <input type="search" placeholder="Search" id="search-field" class="search-field" />
				    <button class="search-submit">
				    	<span class="icon-search" aria-hidden="true"></span>
				    	<span class="is-vishidden">Search</span>
				    </button>
			    </fieldset>
			</form>			<nav id="nav" class="nav" role="navigation">
				<ul class="nav-action-list">
					<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-01-get-help-00-get-help/04-pages-01-get-help-00-get-help.html">Get Help<span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></a></li>
					<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-06-get-involved-00-get-involved-landing/04-pages-06-get-involved-00-get-involved-landing.html">Give Help<span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></a></li>
				</ul>
				<ul id="menu-main-menu" class="menu">
					<li class="menu-item menu-item-object-page menu-item-has-children">
						<a href="#">About</a>
						<ul class="sub-menu">
							<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing.html">About Us</a></li>
							<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing.html">Operations</a></li>
							<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing.html">Board and Management</a></li>

					</li>
					<li class="menu-item menu-item-object-page menu-item-has-children">

	</header>
	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Jobs &amp; Internships</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">Join the fight at the GPCFB to eradicate hunger in the Pittsburgh area and beyond lorem ipsum.</p>
		</div>		<div class="main-body l">
			<div class="l-main lc">
				<h2 class="section-title">Available Jobs &amp; Internships</h2>
				<p class="section-desc">The following career opportunities are currently open at the Food Bank:</p>
				<ul class="post-list">
					<li class="post-li">
						<div class="block block-post">
							<div class="b-body">
								<a href="#" class="b-timestamp">Feb 02, 2014</a>
								<h3 class="b-title"><a href="#">Truck Driver</a></h3>
								<p class="b-excerpt">Responsible for warehouse product care including receiving, storage, distribution, pickup and/or delivery.</p>
							</div>
						</div>					</li>
					<li class="post-li">
						<div class="block block-post">
							<div class="b-body">
								<a href="#" class="b-timestamp">Feb 02</a>
								<h3 class="b-title"><a href="#">Grant Writer</a></h3>
								<p class="b-excerpt">Prepare proposals for submission to potential funding sources to obtain funds for ongoing or special GPCFB projects.</p>
							</div>
						</div>					</li>
					<li class="post-li">
						<div class="block block-post">
							<div class="b-body">
								<a href="#" class="b-timestamp">Feb 02 2014</a>
								<h3 class="b-title"><a href="#">Network Resource Specialist</a></h3>
								<p class="b-excerpt">Provide support to facilitate Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank member network development and provide information, referrals, and food assistance to families within our eleven-county service area.</p>
							</div>
						</div>					</li>
				</ul>		
			</div><!--end .l-main-->
			<div class="well">
				<div class="lc lc-single">
					<h2 class="well-title">Want to Apply?</h2>
					<p class="well-desc">If you would like to apply for a position, you may email your cover letter and resume to careers@pittsburghfoodbank.org, fax to 412-460-0418</p>
					<a href="#" class="btn">Contact Human Resources</a>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="l-sidebar">
				<section class="widget sidebar-section">
					<h3 class="widgettitle">Additional Resources</h3>
					<ul class="text-list">
						<li>
							<a href="#">About the GPCFB</a>

							<a href="#">Operations</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="#">Contact Us</a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</section>
			</div><!--end .l-sidebar2-->
		</div><!--end .l-3col-->
	</div><!--End role=main-->

	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">

					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">

    Grant Writer

    Prepare proposals for submission to potential funding sources to obtain funds for ongoing or special GPCFB projects.

    Job Responsibilities

    • Work with the Chief Executive Officer and Chief Development Officer to secure funds from corporations, mid-sized businesses, foundations, and government sources.
    • Identify, research, solicit corporations, mid-sized businesses, foundations, and government sources of funding.
    • Lead proposal development and grant review processes.
    • Source proposal requirements and submission deadlines and maintain report deadline calendar.
    • Meet with all departments as required to develop proposals, maintain and compile reporting data.
    • Write, edit, proofread, and submit applications and budgets. Coordinate preparation, assembly, and delivery of proposal documents.
    • Follow up reports to Food Bank, corporations, businesses, foundations, and government funders as required.
    • Participate in and support Food Bank special events.

    Job Requirements

    • Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Communications or Professional Writing and five years related experience in grant writing; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
    • Knowledge of Word Processing software; Desktop Publishing; Spreadsheet software; Accounting software; Development software; Internet software; Project Management software and Database software.
    • Excellent grant writing, written and verbal communication skills.
    • Excellent organizational and planning skills.
    • Take initiative to make recommendations, identify and resolve issues. Proven ability to meet critical deadlines and attain goals.
    • Valid drivers’ license.

    Ready to Apply?

    Email your cover letter and resume to careers@pittsburghfoodbank.org, fax to 412-460-0418 (Attn: Human Resources), or mail them to Human Resources, Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank, 1 N Linden St., Duquesne, PA 15110. The Food Bank is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

    Contact Human Resources

    Additional Resources

    • About the GPCFB
    • Board and Management
    • Operations
    • Contact Us

	</header>
	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Grant Writer</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">Prepare proposals for submission to potential funding sources to obtain funds for ongoing or special GPCFB projects.</p>
		</div>		<div class="main-body l">
			<div class="l-main">
				<div class="text">
					<h2>Job Responsibilities</h2>
					<ul>
						<li>Work with the Chief Executive Officer and Chief Development Officer to secure funds from corporations, mid-sized businesses, foundations, and government sources. 
						</li><li>Identify, research, solicit corporations, mid-sized businesses, foundations, and government sources of funding. 
						</li><li>Lead proposal development and grant review processes. 
						</li><li>Source proposal requirements and submission deadlines and maintain report deadline calendar. 
						</li><li>Meet with all departments as required to develop proposals, maintain and compile reporting data. 
						</li><li>Write, edit, proofread, and submit applications and budgets. Coordinate preparation, assembly, and delivery of proposal documents. 
						</li><li>Follow up reports to Food Bank, corporations, businesses, foundations, and government funders as required. 
						</li><li>Participate in and support Food Bank special events. </li>
					</ul>
					<h2>Job Requirements</h2>
					<ul>
						<li>Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Communications or Professional Writing and five years related experience in grant writing; or equivalent combination of education and experience. 
						</li><li>Knowledge of Word Processing software; Desktop Publishing; Spreadsheet software; Accounting software; Development software; Internet software; Project Management software and Database software. 
						</li><li>Excellent grant writing, written and verbal communication skills. 
						</li><li>Excellent organizational and planning skills. 
						</li><li>Take initiative to make recommendations, identify and resolve issues. Proven ability to meet critical deadlines and attain goals. 
						</li><li>Valid drivers’ license. </li>
					</ul>
				</div>
				<div class="well">
					<div class="lc lc-single">
						<h2 class="well-title">Ready to Apply?</h2>
						<p class="well-desc">Email your cover letter and resume to careers@pittsburghfoodbank.org, fax to 412-460-0418 (Attn: Human Resources), or mail them to Human Resources, Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank, 1 N Linden St., Duquesne, PA 15110. The Food Bank is an Equal Opportunity Employer.</p>
						<a href="#" class="btn">Contact Human Resources</a>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><!--end .l-main-->
			<div class="l-sidebar">
				<section class="widget sidebar-section">
					<h3 class="widgettitle">Additional Resources</h3>
					<ul class="text-list">
						<li>
							<a href="#">About the GPCFB</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="#">Board and Management</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="#">Operations</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="#">Contact Us</a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</section>
			</div><!--end .l-sidebar-->
		</div><!--end .l-3col-->
	</div><!--End role=main-->

	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

							<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle">Call Us</h3>
							<div class="acc-panel">
								<a href="tel:+14124603663"><span class="icon-phone"></span>412-460-3663</a>
								<a href="../../patterns/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact.html"><span class="icon-user"></span>Call a department</a>
							</div>
						</div><!--end .gi-->
						<div class="gi">
							<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle"><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact.html">Find Us</a></h3>
								<div class="acc-panel">
									<div class="vcard">
										<div class="adr">
											<div class="org fn">
												<div class="organization-name">Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</div>
											</div>
											<div class="street-address">1 North Linden Street</div>
											<span class="locality">Duquesne</span>, 
											<abbr title="Pennsylvania" class="region">PA</abbr>
											<span class="postal-code">15110</span>
										</div>
									</div>
									<a href="../../patterns/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact.html"><span class="icon-location"></span>Get Directions</a>
								</div>
						</div><!--end .gi-->
						<div class="gi">
							<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle">If you need food</h3>
							<div class="acc-panel">
								<p>If you need food, please contact Hunger Services Network of the Urban League of Pittsburgh</p>
								<a href="tel:+14123250749"><span class="icon-phone"></span>412-325-0749</a>
								<a href="http://ulpgh.org/" rel="external"><span class="icon-link"></span>ulpgh.org</a>
							</div>
						</div><!--end .gi-->
					</div><!--end inner .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .gi-->
				<div class="gi">
					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle">Stay Up to Date</h3>
					<div class="acc-panel">
						<p>Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.</p>
					<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form newsletter-form">

	</footer>
	<!-- End Footer --></div>

    Our History

    Over xx years of fighting hunger in the greater Pittsburgh region lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

    The Food Bank recently marked its 30th Anniversary. When Pittsburgh's great steel mills began closing in the 1980's the Food Bank came into existence as a way to help out the thousands of families suddenly without resources and at risk of hunger. Today, the Food Bank serves populations urban and rural, working, retired, of all ages and economic backgrounds. Below are some highlights from the Food Bank's journey that began in June of 1980.

    A Brief Chronology of Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    1. June 2011

      The Food Bank celebrates its 30th Anniversary.

    2. February 2007

      On a monitoring visit to the Food Bank, Matt Coatar of Feeding America calls GPCFB "the conscience of the network."

    3. Fall 2006

      The Food Bank receives two "Hunger's Hope" Awards from Feeding America for its new Choosing Healthy Options Program, and its advocacy work.

    4. June 2006

      The Food Bank celebrates its 25th Anniversary on National Hunger Awareness Day at a dinner at the Hilton.

    5. January 2006

      The Campaign to End Hunger was launched with a year-long media campaign to raise awareness about hunger and encourage advocacy at all levels.

    6. October 2005

      The Food Bank initiates Produce to People, a Saturday direct distribution program to low-income communities. More than 35,000 pounds of food are distributed on the first Saturday.

    7. 2005

      The Food Bank receives the Congressional Hunger Center's Victory Against Hunger Award.

    8. June 2005

      The Food Bank initiates the National Hunger Awareness Day Awards honoring outstanding community partners of the Food Bank for their continuing support.

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    1 Choose an amount to donate:

    • $25
    • $50
    • $100
    • $250
    • $500
    • $

    2 Enter your information:

    3 Enter your billing info:
