	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Our History</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">Over xx years of fighting hunger in the greater Pittsburgh region lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.</p>
		</div>		<div class="main-body l">
			<div class="l-main">
				<div class="text">
					<p>The Food Bank recently marked its 30th Anniversary. When Pittsburgh's great steel mills began closing in the 1980's the Food Bank came into existence as a way to help out the thousands of families suddenly without resources and at risk of hunger. Today, the Food Bank serves populations urban and rural, working, retired, of all ages and economic backgrounds. Below are some highlights from the Food Bank's journey that began in June of 1980.</p>

					<h2>A Brief Chronology of Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
				</div>
				<div class="lc">
				<ol class="timeline">
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">June 2011</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc">The Food Bank celebrates its 30th Anniversary.</p>
					</li>
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">February 2007</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc">On a monitoring visit to the Food Bank, Matt Coatar of Feeding America calls GPCFB &quot;the conscience of the network.&quot;</p>
					</li>
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">Fall 2006</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc">The Food Bank receives two &quot;Hunger's Hope&quot; Awards from Feeding America for its new Choosing Healthy Options Program, and its advocacy work.</p>
					</li>
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">June 2006</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc">The Food Bank celebrates its 25th Anniversary on National Hunger Awareness Day at a dinner at the Hilton.</p>
					</li>
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">January 2006</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc">The Campaign to End Hunger was launched with a year-long media campaign to raise awareness about hunger and encourage advocacy at all levels.</p>
					</li>
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">October 2005</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc">The Food Bank initiates Produce to People, a Saturday direct distribution program to low-income communities. More than 35,000 pounds of food are distributed on the first Saturday.</p>
					</li>
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">2005</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc">The Food Bank receives the Congressional Hunger Center's Victory Against Hunger Award.</p>
					</li>
					<li class="timeline-li">
						<h4 class="timeline-timestamp">June 2005</h4>
						<p class="timeline-desc"> The Food Bank initiates the National Hunger Awareness Day Awards honoring outstanding community partners of the Food Bank for their continuing support.</p>
					</li>
				</ol>
				</div>
			</div><!--end .l-main-->
			<div class="l-sidebar">
				
			</div><!--end .l-sidebar2-->
		</div><!--end .l-3col-->
		
		
	</div><!--End role=main-->
<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->

    Donors & Sponsors

    We can't do this alone. That's why we're so proud to have the support of lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank is indebted to our community partners who donate or help us purchase food, sponsor our events, and help underwrite the cost of Food Bank operations.

    Foundation grants, corporate sponsorship, and individual donations make up the lion’s share of the funds that support the Food Bank. Government support makes up only 29% of the Food Bank’s budget.

    The Food Bank welcomes donations of food and grocery items. You can find information about most-needed items and drop-off locations on the donate food page. Commercial food donors please read about our food donation programs on the sources of food page.

    Thanks to our amazing sponsors

    •

    Become a Sponsor

    Help fight hunger, benefit lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

    Contact Us

    • $50
    • $100
    • $250
    • $500
    • $

	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Donors &amp; Sponsors</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">We can't do this alone. That's why we're so proud to have the support of lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.</p>
		</div>		<div class="main-body l">
			<div class="l-main lc">
				<div class="text">
					<p>Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank is indebted to our community partners who donate or help us purchase food, sponsor our events, and help underwrite the cost of Food Bank operations.

<p>Foundation grants, corporate sponsorship, and individual donations make up the lion’s share of the funds that support the Food Bank. Government support makes up only 29% of the Food Bank’s budget.

<p>The Food Bank welcomes donations of food and grocery items. You can find information about most-needed items and drop-off locations on the donate food page. Commercial food donors please read about our food donation programs on the sources of food page.
				</div>
				<section class="section">
					<header class="section-header">
						<h2 class="section-title">Thanks to our amazing sponsors</h2>
					</header>

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

    HTML

    									
										<div class="page" id="page">
	<!-- Begin .header -->
	<header class="header" role="banner">
		<div class="lc">
		<a href="../../patterns/04-pages-00-home-00-homepage/04-pages-00-home-00-homepage.html" rel="home" class="logo-link" tabindex="1"><img src="../../images/logo.svg" class="logo" alt="Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank, a member of Feeding America" /></a>			<a href="#search-form" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-search"><span class="icon-search"></span></a>
			<a href="#nav" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-menu"><span class="icon-menu2"></span><span class="nav-toggle-label">Menu</span></a>
			<div class="header-nav-container">
			<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form search-form">           
			    <fieldset>
				    <legend class="is-vishidden">Search</legend>
				    <label for="search-field" class="is-vishidden">Search</label>
				    <input type="search" placeholder="Search" id="search-field" class="search-field" />
				    <button class="search-submit">
				    	<span class="icon-search" aria-hidden="true"></span>
				    	<span class="is-vishidden">Search</span>
				    </button>
			    </fieldset>
			</form>			<nav id="nav" class="nav" role="navigation">
				<ul class="nav-action-list">
					<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-01-get-help-00-get-help/04-pages-01-get-help-00-get-help.html">Get Help<span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></a></li>
					<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-06-get-involved-00-get-involved-landing/04-pages-06-get-involved-00-get-involved-landing.html">Give Help<span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></a></li>
				</ul>
				<ul id="menu-main-menu" class="menu">
					<li class="menu-item menu-item-object-page menu-item-has-children">
						<a href="#">About</a>
						<ul class="sub-menu">
							<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing/04-pages-03-about-00-about-landing.html">About Us</a></li>

	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">

					</div><!--end .g-2up-->

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    • $50

    • $

    If you need food

    If you need food, please contact Hunger Services Network of the Urban League of Pittsburgh

    412-325-0749 ulpgh.org

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->

					<div class="acc-panel">

    Events

    Food distribution, fundraisers, lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Sed, sint.

    • List

    • March 5 - April 18, 2014

      Corpus Christi Parish Fish Fry

      2515 Versailles Ave, McKeesport, PA 15132

      Parish Fish Fries abound during the Lenten season, but this one is extra special – 10% of the proceeds will benefit the Food Bank!

    Want to organize an event?

    Want to fight hunger and give back to your community? Organize and event benefiting the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank! If you're interested in organizing an event, please contact our Special Events Coordinator. Contact Us

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->

    D-Jam 2014

    The 15th Annual D-Jam is certainly NOT a night to be missed!

    15th Annual D-JAM is set - this year at the Rex Theater in Pittsburgh's Historic South Side!

    This year, groove to the sounds of Dave Tauberg and theCAUSE with special guest Steve Kimock!

    Come see Pittsburgh's favorite jamband play the Grateful Dead, The Beatles, Bob Dylan, Phish, and other favorites.

    This is certainly NOT a night to be missed!

							<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-07-resources-02-resources-detail/04-pages-07-resources-02-resources-detail.html">Food Sources</a></li>

							<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-07-resources-02-resources-detail/04-pages-07-resources-02-resources-detail.html">Links</a></li>
						</ul>
					</li>
					<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-08-blog-00-blog-landing/04-pages-08-blog-00-blog-landing.html">News</a></li>
					<li><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-04-events-00-events-landing/04-pages-04-events-00-events-landing.html">Events</a></li>

				</ul>
			</nav><!--end .nav-->
			</div>
		</div>
	</header>
	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">D-Jam 2014</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">The 15th Annual D-Jam is certainly NOT a night to be missed!</p>
		</div>		<div class="main-body l">
			<div class="l-main">
				<div class="text">
					<p><img src="../../images/fpo_thumb.png" alt="Thumb" /></p>
					<p>15th Annual D-JAM is set - this year at the Rex Theater in Pittsburgh's Historic South Side!</p>

					<p>This year, groove to the sounds of Dave Tauberg and theCAUSE with special guest Steve Kimock!</p>

					<p>Come see Pittsburgh's favorite jamband play the Grateful Dead, The Beatles,  Bob Dylan, Phish, and other favorites.</p>

					<p>This is certainly NOT a night to be missed!</p>
				</div>

    Special Events

    Special events help raise funds for operating expenses and food while raising awareness about hunger in our community.

    These events help us engage the public in our mission, keep the community abreast of news about hunger, and contribute to the rich cultural fabric of the region.

    Blues for Food

    Local blues musician Eugene Morgan (of Eugene & the Nightcrawlers) and his friends liven up a couple of Sundays in February and August each year with this local all-day blues bash at Delmenico's Pizzeria & Ristorante in Cranberry. All proceeds benefit the Food Bank. Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    D-Jam

    An annual rock against hunger evening of local music to support the Food Bank. Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    Empty Bowls

    A simple meal of soup and bread to raise awareness about hunger in our community. Held annually in March, Empty Bowls features soups donated from Pittsburgh's restaurants, entertainment, silent auction of world-class ceramic art and celebrity autographed bowls, kids' activities, and each ticket holder chooses a beautiful hand made ceramic bowl to take home. Benefits the Food Bank and Just Harvest. Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    Fall FoodShare

    On weekends during October & November, the Girl Scouts of America and other volunteers will be at many local Giant Eagle supermarkets collecting food. While you're shopping, purchase a few extra items for the hungry, or make a cash donation at the register. Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    Golf S.O.M.E.

    Yes, it's another golf tournament, but for such a great cause, how can you resist? Come Golf (So Others May Eat)! Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    Hunger Awareness Day

    Held the first Tuesday in June, Hunger Awareness Day is the Food Bank's day to bring attention to childhood hunger as the school year ends. We also celebrate some special supporters with Hunger Awareness Day Awards. Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    KD Turkey Fund

    More than 30 years ago, KDKA-TV personality Al Julius was given a ten-dollar bill by a listener with instructions to "help a local family have a Thanksgiving turkey," and the KD Turkey Drive was born. Over twelve million dollars later, tens of thousands of families in need have been able to gather with their families and celebrate with thanks of their own.

    Penguins Food Drive

    The Penguins Annual Food Drive tradition continues. Fans bring non-perishables to a home game, or make a cash donation, and get a raffle ticket for some cool autographed Penguin stuff. The date varies, but we'll remind you! Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    Pittsburgh Blues Festival

    The Food Bank's signature annual fundraising event. Pittsburgh Blues Festival takes place in July at Hartwood Acres, and features the best in national and local blues musicians. Visit the Blues Festival website for all the details! Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    Scouting for Food

    Scouting for Food is the Boy Scouts of America-Laurel Highlands Council's annual food drive, the largest of the spring season. Scouts collect food in their neighborhoods and many conscientious corporations participate by collecting food or hosting a Virtual Food Drive. This region-wide drive helps the Food Bank and dozens of local food pantries.

    Stamp Out Hunger

    The National Association of Letter Carriers' "Stamp Out Hunger" Campaign is the largest one-day food drive in the nation, collecting more than 70 million pounds of food each year. Held in mid-May, all you have to do is put a sturdy bag of non-perishable grocery items out by your mail box before your regular mail delivery time, and your friendly letter carrier will pick it up. All donations remain in the area they were collected - a great opportunity to help struggling families right in your neighborhood!

    Steelers Food Drive

    Our own Super Bowl champion team helps the Food Bank with an annual food drive at a home game in the fall. The date varies, so check back to keep track! Learn about sponsorship opportunities.

    Walk for A Healthy Community

    Held in May, the Highmark Walk for A Healthy Community benefits dozens of local charities which sign up walkers and sponsors. Highmark Blue Cross Blue Shield underwrites the cost of the Walk, so all proceeds go directly to the charities. Combining healthy exercise with supporting the Food Bank - what a concept!

    Want to organize an event?

    The Food Bank divides special events into two types, those we sponsor and organize, and those that are created and carried out by people or groups in the community on our behalf. If you wish to hold an event on our behalf, please contact the Special Events Coordinator.

    Join Our Newsletter

    Stay up-to-date on upcoming events, program news, etc lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing.

    412-460-3663 Call a department

    Find Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    Get Directions

    If you need food

    If you need food, please contact Hunger Services Network of the Urban League of Pittsburgh

    412-325-0749 ulpgh.org

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

	</header>
	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Special Events</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">Special events help raise funds for operating expenses and food while raising awareness about hunger in our community.</p>
		</div>		<div class="main-body l">
			<div class="l-main">
				<section class="section">
						<div class="text">
	                    <p>These events help us engage the public in our mission, keep the community abreast of news about hunger, and contribute to the rich cultural fabric of the region.</p>
	 
						
										
				<a id="blues" name="bff"></a>
				<h3>Blues for Food</h3>
				<p> Local blues musician Eugene Morgan (of Eugene &amp; the Nightcrawlers) and his friends liven up a couple of Sundays in February and August each year with this local all-day blues bash at Delmenico's Pizzeria &amp; Ristorante in Cranberry. All proceeds benefit the Food Bank. <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		
						
				<a id="d" name="d"></a>	
				<h3>D-Jam</h3>
				<p>An annual rock against hunger evening of local music to support the Food Bank. <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		

				<a id="empty" name="empty"></a>	
				<h3>Empty Bowls</h3>
				<p> A simple meal of soup and bread to raise awareness about hunger in our community. Held annually in March, Empty Bowls features soups donated from Pittsburgh's restaurants, entertainment, silent auction of world-class ceramic art and celebrity autographed bowls, kids' activities, and each ticket holder chooses a beautiful hand made ceramic bowl to take home. Benefits the Food Bank and Just Harvest. <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		
				
				<a id="fall" name="fall"></a>	
				<h3>Fall FoodShare</h3>
				<p>On weekends during October &amp; November, the Girl Scouts of America and other volunteers will be at many local Giant Eagle supermarkets collecting food. While you're shopping, purchase a few extra items for the hungry, or make a cash donation at the register. <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		
		
				<a id="golf" name="golf"></a>	
				<h3>Golf S.O.M.E.</h3>
				<p>Yes, it's another golf tournament, but for such a great cause, how can you resist? Come Golf (So Others May Eat)! <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		

				<a id="hung" name="hung"></a>	
				<h3>Hunger Awareness Day</h3>
				<p>Held the first Tuesday in June, Hunger Awareness Day is the Food Bank's day to bring attention to childhood hunger as the school year ends. We also celebrate some special supporters with Hunger Awareness Day Awards. <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		
				

			<a id="kd" name="kd"></a>	
			<h3>KD Turkey Fund</h3>
			<p>More than 30 years ago, KDKA-TV personality Al Julius was given a ten-dollar bill by a listener with instructions to "help a local family have a Thanksgiving turkey," and the KD Turkey Drive was born. Over twelve million dollars later, tens of thousands of families in need have been able to gather with their families and celebrate with thanks of their own. </p>		

							
				<a id="pens" name="pens"></a>				
				<h3>Penguins Food Drive</h3>
				<p>The Penguins Annual Food Drive tradition continues. Fans bring non-perishables to a home game, or make a cash donation, and get a raffle ticket for some cool autographed Penguin stuff. The date varies, but we'll remind you!  <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		
				
				
					<a id="A1" name="blues"></a>	
					<h3>Pittsburgh Blues Festival</h3>
					<p>The Food Bank's signature annual fundraising event. Pittsburgh Blues Festival takes place in July at Hartwood Acres, and features the best in national and local blues musicians. Visit the <a href="http://www.pghblues.com" rel="external">Blues Festival website </a> for all the details! <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>			

					<a id="scout" name="scout"></a>	
					<h3>Scouting for Food</h3>
					<p>Scouting for Food is the Boy Scouts of America-Laurel Highlands Council's annual food drive, the largest of the spring season. Scouts collect food in their neighborhoods and many conscientious corporations participate by collecting food or hosting a Virtual Food Drive. This region-wide drive helps the Food Bank and dozens of local food pantries.</p>		

					<a id="stamp" name="stamp"></a>	
					<h3>Stamp Out Hunger</h3>
					<p>The National Association of Letter Carriers' "Stamp Out Hunger" Campaign is the largest one-day food drive in the nation, collecting more than 70 million pounds of food each year. Held in mid-May, all you have to do is put a sturdy bag of non-perishable grocery items out by your mail box before your regular mail delivery time, and your friendly letter carrier will pick it up. All donations remain in the area they were collected - a great opportunity to help struggling families right in your neighborhood! </p>		

					<a id="steel" name="steel"></a>	
					<h3>Steelers Food Drive</h3>
					<p>Our own Super Bowl champion team helps the Food Bank with an annual food drive at a home game in the fall. The date varies, so check back to keep track! <a href="../donate/donors.aspx">Learn about sponsorship opportunities</a>.</p>		

					
					<a id="walk" name="walk"></a>	
					<h3>Walk for A Healthy Community</h3>
					<p>Held in May, the Highmark Walk for A Healthy Community benefits dozens of local charities which sign up walkers and sponsors. Highmark Blue Cross Blue Shield underwrites the cost of the Walk, so all proceeds go directly to the charities. Combining healthy exercise with supporting the Food Bank - what a concept! </p>		
				  	</div>

				</section>
				<hr />
				<section class="section">
					<h2>Want to organize an event?</h2>
					<p>The Food Bank divides special events into two types, those we sponsor and organize, and those that are created and carried out by people or groups in the community on our behalf. If you wish to hold an event on our behalf, please <a href="#">contact the Special Events Coordinator.</a></p>
				</section>
			</div><!--end .l-main-->
			<div class="l-sidebar">
				<div class="well">
					<div class="lc lc-single">
						<h2 class="well-title">Join Our Newsletter</h2>
						<p class="well-desc">Stay up-to-date on upcoming events, program news, etc lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing.</p>
						<a href="#" class="btn">Sign up now</a>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div><!--end .l-sidebar-->
		</div><!--end .l-3col-->
	</div><!--End role=main-->
<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>

					</div>
					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle"><a href="#">Latest from the Blog</a></h3>
					<div class="acc-panel">
						<div class="block block-post-small">
							<h4 class="b-title"><a href="#">Brad Paisley Concert Food Drive</a></h4>
							<p class="b-timestamp">March 23, 2014</p>
						</div>
						<a href="../../patterns/04-pages-08-blog-00-blog-landing/04-pages-08-blog-00-blog-landing.html">View all news</a>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</nav>
			<hr />
			<div class="g g-2up footer-contact">
				<div class="gi">
					<div class="g g-2up footer-contact-area">
						<div class="gi">
							<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle"><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact/04-pages-09-contact-00-contact.html">Email Us</a></h3>

									<div class="vcard">

					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle">Stay Up to Date</h3>
					<div class="acc-panel">
						<p>Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.</p>
					<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form newsletter-form">

    Donate to the GPCFB

    95% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry lorem ipsum dolar

    1 Choose an amount to donate:

    • $25
    • $50
    • $100
    • $250
    • $500
    • $

    2 Enter your information:

    3 Enter your billing info:

    Credit Card Info

	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="page-header peppers2">
			<h1 class="page-title">Donate to the GPCFB</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">95% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry lorem ipsum dolar</p>
		</div>		
		<section class="section">
			<div class="lc lc-single">
				<div class="donate donate-page">
	<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
		<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
	    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
	    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
	    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
	    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
	    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
	    
		<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
			<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
			
			<ul class="chicklet-list">
				<li>
					<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
				</li>
				<li>
					<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
				</li>
				<li>
					<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
				</li>
				<li>
					<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
				</li>
				<li>
					<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
				</li>
				<li>
					<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
						<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
					</div>
				</li>
			</ul>
			
			<div class="field-container amount-container">
				<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
				<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
			</div>
			
			<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
				<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
				<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
			</div>
		</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

		<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

			<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
			<div class="g g-2up">
				<div class="field-container gi">
					<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
					<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
				</div>
				<div class="field-container gi">
					<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
					<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
				</div>
				<div class="field-container gi">
					<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
					<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
				</div>
				<div class="field-container gi">
					<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
					<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
				</div>
				<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
					<label for="donate-city">City</label>
					<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
				</div>
				<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
					<label for="donate-state">State</label>
					<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
				</div>
			</div><!--end .g-2up-->
		</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
		
		<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
			<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
			
			<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
				<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
				<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
			</div>
			
			<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
				<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
				<div class="credit-card-group">
					<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
					<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
					<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
					<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
					<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
					<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
					<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
					<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
				</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
			</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
			
			<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
						<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
						<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
		</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
		<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
	</form><!--end .donate-form-->				</div>			</div>
			
		</section>
		
	</div><!--End role=main-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->
	<footer class="footer" role="contentinfo">
		<div class="footer-btn-bar-container">
			<div class="footer-btn-bar">
				<a href="#">Get Help<span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></a>
				<a href="#">Give Help<span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></a>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="lc">
		<nav role="navigation" class="nav-footer">
			<div class="g g-4up">
				<div class="gi">
					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle"><a href="#">Programs</a></h3>
					<ul class="acc-panel">
						<li><a href="#">Produce to People</a></li>

				</div>
				<div class="gi">
					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle"><a href="#">About</a></h3>
					<ul class="acc-panel">
						<li><a href="#">About Us</a></li>
						<li><a href="#">Operations</a></li>

					</ul>
				</div>
				<div class="gi">
					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle"><a href="#">Resources</a></h3>
					<ul class="acc-panel">
						<li><a href="#">Resource Center</a></li>

				</div>
				<div class="gi">			
					<h3 class="nav-footer-item acc-handle"><a href="../../patterns/04-pages-04-events-00-events-landing/04-pages-04-events-00-events-landing.html">Upcoming Events</a></h3>

    Get Involved

    Help eradicate hunger in southwestern PA lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

    Donate your time. Make a difference.

    Learn about the many ways you can help end hunger lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

    View volunteer opportunities

    More Ways to Get Involved

    Organize a Food Drive

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Make a Donation

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Donate Food

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Get Informed

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Stay up to date

    Join our newsletter Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    1 Choose an amount to donate:

    • $25
    • $50
    • $100
    • $250
    • $500
    • $

    2 Enter your information:

    3 Enter your billing info:

<div class="donate donate-widget">
	<div class="lc lc-single">
		<h2 class="section-title">Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<form method="post" action="https://secure2.convio.net/gpcfb/site/CRDonationAPI" class="donate-form luminateApi donation-form" id="donate-form">
			<input type="hidden" name="method" value="donate" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="form_id" value="4080" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="validate" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="df_preview" value="true" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.first" id="billing-first-name" value="" />
		    <input type="hidden" name="billing.name.last" id="billing-last-name" value="" />
		    
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-1">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">1</span> <span class="donate-step-message">Choose an amount to donate:</span></h4>
				
				<ul class="chicklet-list">
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="25" data-message="$25 can feed a person for a week" tabindex="1">$25</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="50" data-message="$50 can feed a family for a week"  class="active" tabindex="2">$50</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="100" data-message="$100 can feed a family of 4 for a week" tabindex="3">$100</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="250" data-message="$250 can feed a family of 4 for two weeks"  tabindex="4">$250</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<a href="#" data-amount="500" data-message="$500 can feed a family of 4 for four weeks"  tabindex="5">$500</a>
					</li>
					<li>
						<div class="input-container" data-message="Every dollar you donate helps end hunger.">
							<span class="input-addon">$</span><input type="text" id="other-amount" placeholder="Other"  tabindex="6" />
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
				
				<div class="field-container amount-container">
					<label for="other">Enter Amount</label>
					<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="donation-amount" name="donation_amount" placeholder="$50.00" />
				</div>
				
				<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
					<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
					<label for="donate-monthly">I would like to make this a monthly donation</label>
				</div>
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</h4>
				<div class="g g-2up">
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-name">Full Name</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="Firstname Lastname" autocomplete="off" required pattern="\ " data-parsley-pattern="\ " data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your first and last name" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
						<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid e-mail address" name="donor.email" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St, Apt 2" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your street address" name="billing.address.street1" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi">
						<label for="donate-zip">ZIP</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-zip" placeholder="15201" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter a valid ZIP code" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-city">
						<label for="donate-city">City</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required data-parsley-error-message="Please enter your city" name="billing.address.city" />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container gi field-container-state">
						<label for="donate-state">State</label>
						<input type="text" id="donate-state" placeholder="PA" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" required />
					</div>
				</div><!--end .g-2up-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			
			<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
				<h4 class="donate-step-legend"><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter your billing info:</h4>
				
				<div class="radio-container" id="payment-type-radio">
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type" checked="checked" data-payment-type="payment-type-cc" /> Credit Card</label>
					<label><input type="radio" name="payment_type"  data-payment-type="payment-type-bank" /> Bank Account</label>
				</div>
				
				<div class="payment-type active" id="payment-type-cc">
					<h4>Credit Card Info</h4>
					<div class="credit-card-group">
						<label for="card-number">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-number" id="card-number" name="card_number">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="MM/YY" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-expiration" id="card-expiration" name="card_exp">
						<label for="card-cvv">Credit Card Expiration</label>
						<input placeholder="CVV" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-cvv" id="card-cvv" name="card_cvv">
						<label for="card-expiration">Credit Card Billing ZIP Code</label>
						<input placeholder="ZIP" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" class="card-zip">
					</div><!--end .credit-card-group-->
				</div><!--end .payment-type-bank-->
				
				<div class="payment-type" id="payment-type-bank">
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-routing">Routing Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-routing" placeholder="036001808" pattern="[0-9]*" autocomplete="off" name="billing.address.state" />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="bank-account">Bank Account Number</label>
							<input type="text" id="bank-account" placeholder="0175380001" pattern="[0-9]*" name="billing.address.zip" />
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
				</div><!--end .payment-container-bank-->
			</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
			<button class="donate-submit btn"><span class="donate-submit-text">Donate</span> <span class="icon-arrow-right5"></span></button>
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->

    Volunteer

    Volunteer your time at GPCFB events Lorem ipsum.

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. At, voluptatum, ratione labore laudantium assumenda molestiae ipsa dignissimos accusamus amet omnis distinctio sit inventore minima. Magni, hic nam maiores iste sit

    Repack

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Produce To People

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Special Events

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Gleaning

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.

    Volunteer Age Requirements

    • Age 4+ (w/adult): Fall Food Share Food Drive
    • Age 7+ (w/adult): Gleaning
    • Age 12+ (w/adult): Repack, Clerical, Produce to People, Some Food Drives
    • Age 15+: Empty Bowls
    • Age 18+: Blues Festival

    Volunteer

    Description of the volunteer call to action

    Volunteer now

    Upcoming Events

    • Event Title

      April 24

    • Another Event Title

      May 21

    • Here's Another Event Title

      June 23

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    1 Choose an amount to donate:

    • $25
    • $50
    • $100
    • $250
    • $500
    • $

    2 Enter your information:

    3 Enter your billing info:

	<!-- End .header -->	<main role="main">
		<div class="page-header ">
			<h1 class="page-title">Volunteer</h1>
			<p class="page-intro">Volunteer your time at GPCFB events Lorem ipsum.</p>
		</div>		<div class="l">
			<div class="lc">
				<div class="l-main">
					<div class="text">
						<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. At, voluptatum, ratione labore laudantium assumenda molestiae ipsa dignissimos accusamus amet omnis distinctio sit inventore minima. Magni, hic nam maiores iste sit</p>
					</div>
					<div class="g g-4up">
						<div class="gi">
							<div class="block block-thumb">
								<a href="#" class="b-inner">
									<div class="b-img">
			<img src="../../images/fpo_square.png" alt="Square Thumbnail" />									</div>
									<div class="b-text">
										<h2 class="b-title">Repack</h2>
										<p class="b-excerpt">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.</p>
									</div>
								</a>
							</div>						</div>
						<div class="gi">
							<div class="block block-thumb">
								<a href="#" class="b-inner">
									<div class="b-img">
			<img src="../../images/fpo_square.png" alt="Square Thumbnail" />									</div>
									<div class="b-text">
										<h2 class="b-title">Produce To People</h2>
										<p class="b-excerpt">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Molestias, voluptate.</p>
									</div>
								</a>
							</div>						</div>
						<div class="gi">
							<div class="block block-thumb">
								<a href="#" class="b-inner">
									<div class="b-img">
			<img src="../../images/fpo_square.png" alt="Square Thumbnail" />									</div>
									<div class="b-text">

					<hr />
					<div class="text">
						<h2>Volunteer Age Requirements</h2>
						<ul>
							<li><strong>Age 4+ (w/adult):</strong> Fall Food Share Food Drive</li>
							<li><strong>Age 7+ (w/adult):</strong> Gleaning</li>
							<li><strong>Age 12+ (w/adult):</strong> Repack, Clerical, Produce to People, Some Food Drives </li>
							<li><strong>Age 15+:</strong> Empty Bowls</li>
							<li><strong>Age 18+:</strong> Blues Festival</li>
						</ul>
					</div>
				</div><!--end .l-main-->
			</div><!--end .lc-->
